posts.post_title: Old Judge Harry Wright for sale -- $2K
posts.post_content: You won't find one much cheaper.  $2,000 shipped.  Please email me at [url]pstewart@kmob.com[/url].

Please note that this card is not trimmed or rebacked and is guaranteed to get a number grade.

Paul
Harry Wright is sold.  Thank you
